game.name: Heart of Gaia
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Lead the resistance against an ancient dark order that seeks to awaken an ancient evil and plunge Gaia into chaos. Explore a vast steampunk fantasy world and face formidable opponents in this action RPG, featuring real-time character switching and dynamic combat.
